wao.....720p of two open seasons....can we expect 720p of the 1st movie as well??

Video: decent (but not good. 720p is not yet ready for 700mb releases, imho)
Audio: 64kbps (aka low quality)
It's good if you don't have the bandwith (or hdd space), but I do and I'd rather see a 1.4gb (or more) version of this with at least better audio.
Anyway, I know I have high standards and there are lots of people not as spoiled as me ;) so I guess this is good enough for lots of people.
Thanks for sharing!

After I have finished downloading a movie, is there a simply and reliable way of sending through a comment to rate it without having to copy down who I leeched from and search for the particular movie again. I find it very time consuming and lately I havent been writing any comments. Thank you.
